attributes.action: Stop the mistreatment of domestic animals!
attributes.additional_details: We have chosen the issue of domestic animal mistreatment, we chose this issue as my peers and i believe the mistreatment of domestic animals is unacceptable, we believe all domestic animals should be cared for and entitled to a full and healthy life. Our issue links to the animal welfare laws and that anyone who cannot stick to these is not legible to look after domestic animals, we decided on our chosen charity as we share the same views on the issue and are passionate about taking action upon our views.
